text: The 1957–58 Eerste Divisie was the 2nd Eerste Divisie tournament. It was won by Willem II and ADO Den Haag. == Tables == The 32 teams in the tournament were put into two groups. === Eerste Divisie A === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA Pts GD Notes 1 Willem II 30 18 7 5 79 46 43 +33 Championship play-off because they have the same points. 2 FC Dordrecht 30 18 7 5 71 36 43 +35 Championship play-off because they have the same points. 3 HVC 30 18 5 7 78 37 41 +41 4 De Graafschap 30 16 3 11 63 57 35 +6 5 Vitesse 30 16 3 11 63 58 35 +5 6 FC Volendam 30 14 6 10 62 47 34 +15 7 SBV Excelsior 30 14 6 10 46 42 34 +4 8 SVV 30 14 6 10 59 54 34 +5 9 Alkmaar '54 30 13 6 11 57 51 32 +6 10 VV Helmond 30 12 7 11 48 46 31 +2 11 DWS 30 11 4 15 54 58 26 -4 Played as BVC Amsterdam next season. 12 VSV 30 8 5 17 33 61 21 -28 13 RBC Roosendaal 30 6 7 17 40 66 19 -26 14 AGOVV Apeldoorn 30 7 5 18 41 70 19 -29 15 Roda Sport 30 5 7 18 34 66 17 -32 16 HFC EDO 30 5 6 19 24 57 16 -33 Relegated to Tweede Divisie. ==== Championship play-offs ==== Willem II defeated FC Dordrecht 3–1 to win the tournament. === Eerste Divisie B === Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA Pts GD Notes 1 SHS 30 19 6 5 80 48 44 +32 Promoted to Eredivisie. 2 Stormvogels 30 19 4 7 76 48 42 +28 3 Leeuwarden 30 17 6 7 74 45 40 +29 4 Sittardia 30 15 6 9 61 44 36 +17 5 HFC Haarlem 30 14 3 13 47 48 31 -1 6 De Volewijckers 30 12 6 12 47 49 30 -2 7 FC Eindhoven 30 11 7 12 62 58 29 +4 8 RCH 30 12 5 13 55 56 29 -1 9 Limburgia 30 10 8 12 54 52 28 +2 10 FC Wageningen 30 9 10 11 67 69 28 -2 11 Helmondia '55 30 11 6 13 46 54 28 -8 12 Hermes DVS 30 10 7 13 55 58 27 -3 13 Fortuna Vlaardingen 30 8 9 13 51 77 25 -26 14 KFC 30 7 9 14 35 56 23 -21 15 Rigtersbleek 30 7 8 15 51 74 22 -23 16 Xerxes 30 6 6 18 39 64 18 -25 Relegated to Tweede Divisie. == Related pages == * 1957–58 Eredivisie Category:1957 in Europe Category:1958 in European football Category:football in the Netherlands Category:1950s in the Netherlands
title: 1957–58 Eerste Divisie
